name: How to get Exiled
description:
Erin, a Court performer of Thalor, realises that with their homeland being on the brink of war with an enemy nation, rather than being executed for attempting to run away they search for methods to be exiled.

With the help of their nation's Princess, Erin learns what it means to survive in times of turmoil and how luck sometimes isn't always on their side.

𝅘𝅥𝅮 Oh, what is a simple performer to do? 𝅘𝅥𝅮

·•·

This is one of the three central routes that were originally envisioned for the project, I may update and add these additional routes in due time.

There are currently four endings for this route.

This is a submission for the Twine Survival Guide Jam.

Thank you for checking out my submission and I hope you enjoy it!

Made with Sugarcube.
